text: Béatrice Vialle (born 4 August 1961 at Bourges) is a French pilot.Béatrice Vialle She is one of the two female Concorde pilots. Béatrice VIALLE She was the first French female pilot on a supersonic airliner. She graduated from École nationale de l'aviation civile (promotion 1981). 31 mai 2003 == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the École nationale de l'aviation civile Category:French aviators Category:People from Bourges
title: Béatrice Vialle
